downloadButtonRmd <- function (outputId, label = "Download", class = NULL, ...)  {
  tags$a(id = outputId, class = paste("btn btn-default shiny-download-link", 
                                      class), href = "", target = "_blank", download = NA, 
         icon("download"), label, ...)
}
